text:
Watch Vanessa Hudgens and Ashley Tisdale Twerk It Out In This Sizzling Instagram Video

This looks like one helluva pool party.

Photos: Maxim

Former High School Musical actresses Vanessa Hudgens and Ashely Tisdale graduated from Disney stardom to total smokeshows long ago, and they’ve reminded us of that fact with a saucy new Instagram clip.

6 bottles of whispering angel in…😳😝 A post shared by Vanessa Hudgens (@vanessahudgens) on May 28, 2017 at 11:12am PDT

” tml-render-layout=”inline

Dancing poolside with a sexy squad that included Vanessa’s younger sister Stella, Aussie singer/dancer Laura New, and DJ/producer GG Magree, the former Maxim cover girls twerked to the beat of Kendrick Lamar’s “DNA,” a hard-hitting track from his recently-released album, DAMN.

Did someone say girls pool day? A post shared by Vanessa Hudgens (@vanessahudgens) on May 27, 2017 at 4:20pm PDT

” tml-render-layout=”inline

These ladies must love their followers, because Ashley posted a second booty-licious poolside video.

Livin with my ladies. @vanessahudgens @stellahudgens @laurajaynenew @ggmagree A post shared by Ashley Tisdale (@ashleytisdale) on May 27, 2017 at 3:24pm PDT

” tml-render-layout=”inline

And then she went solo to show off her backside in a high-riding leopard print swimsuit.

Summer lovin' ☀️🌻 A post shared by Ashley Tisdale (@ashleytisdale) on May 27, 2017 at 2:04pm PDT

” tml-render-layout=”inline

Both of these foxy ladies’ Instagram feeds are (almost) too hot to handle. Check out some of their sexiest selections below:

I left my heart… in Positano ❤ #VsVivaItaly A post shared by Vanessa Hudgens (@vanessahudgens) on Jul 13, 2016 at 12:33pm PDT

” tml-render-layout=”inline

I call it Malibooya 🌊 ☀️ A post shared by Vanessa Hudgens (@vanessahudgens) on May 1, 2017 at 11:17am PDT

” tml-render-layout=”inline

#FBF at the Creative Arts Emmys! #GoGrease 🏆 A post shared by Vanessa Hudgens (@vanessahudgens) on Sep 23, 2016 at 12:18pm PDT

” tml-render-layout=”inline

Morning. A post shared by Ashley Tisdale (@ashleytisdale) on Dec 28, 2016 at 8:29am PST

” tml-render-layout=”inline

Sunday funday ☀️ A post shared by Ashley Tisdale (@ashleytisdale) on Apr 2, 2017 at 10:35am PDT

” tml-render-layout=”inline

It was worth a second look. A post shared by Ashley Tisdale (@ashleytisdale) on Feb 4, 2017 at 7:26pm PST

” tml-render-layout=”inline
title: Watch Vanessa Hudgens and Ashley Tisdale Twerk It Out In This Sizzling Instagram Video
